item.title: 特朗普也有压力了[150-200]
item.description:
特朗普也有压力了 "The moves come at a time of growing
anxiety over the geographic linchpin of his
2020 hopes. The Trump campaign recently
completed a 17-state polling project that
concluded the president trails Joe Biden in
Pennsylvania, Wisconsin, and Michigan,
according to two people briefed on the
results. America First Action, the principal
pro-trump super PAC, is expected to conduct
its own polling and focus groups in
Pennsylvania and Michigan later this
summer, Politico reported Monday.
特朗普自己团队的民调显示宾夕法尼亚州，威斯康辛州，密歇根州民调落后于拜登。爱荷华州去年中期选举已经抛弃共和党了。如果俄亥俄州民调结果出来，也低于拜登的话，2020总统选举特朗普连任压力就大，共和党只要丢掉宾州和俄亥俄就必然选不上。所以估计共和党内部会施压特朗普。
